name: Bean (itch) (Arnaud.Thibeaux, ixcer)
description:
Bean is a Plateformer where you play this little Ent sprout called «Bean».

Bean use his unique power to grow roots. He use this roots as platform so he goes throught the cave he's lost in.

Along his path, he will find little Ent seed. They will follow Bean and open locked door for him, or activate device.

This game was created for the 2023 Global Game Jam.
